% LaTeX document with intentionally missing package
% Used to test error handling and diagnostic capabilities
\documentclass{article}

% This package does NOT exist - should trigger LatexCompileError
\usepackage{nonexistent-test-package-xyz-12345}

\title{Missing Package Test}
\author{Test Suite}

\begin{document}

\maketitle

\section{Error Test}

This document should fail to compile because the package
\texttt{nonexistent-test-package-xyz-12345} does not exist.

The test suite expects:
\begin{itemize}
  \item LatexCompileError to be thrown
  \item missingInputs array to contain the package name
  \item Log file to be written to cache directory
  \item Diagnostic information to be captured
\end{itemize}

\end{document}
